Package com.ubudu.indoorlocation Description

Indoor location package provides a solution for a mobile device to estimate its position in the indoor environment. Package is strictly connected with Ubudu SDK. The position and movement are analysed in real time based on many beacons placed around the mobile device in a particular environment. This solution allows the user to create his dedicated map on the Ubudu manager platform. A map can be attached to the particular venue previously created on the manager platform. Ubudu Indoor Location provides georeferencing feature so it should work with any map display provider.
